Name: Football Goal
Description: A Football Goal is a point scored in a football game.

Properties.Name: Match
Properties.Description: The match in which this goal was scored

Properties.Name: Minute
Properties.Description: The minute during the match in which the goal was scored

Properties.Name: Point awarded to
Properties.Description: The team which was awarded the goal

Properties.Name: Scorer
Properties.Description: The player who scored the goal
